== Varca (CT) (626932) ==

Varca (CT) is a town in the [[SALCETE 002]] taluka of [[SOUTH GOA]] district with an area of 8.2 sq. km. and harbouring 1393 households with total population of 5439 as per the 2011 Census. The district headquarter [[MARGAO]] is at a distance of 7 km. The state headquarter [[PANAJI]] is at a distance of 40 km. Male population is 2583 and female population is 2856. Scheduled Caste population is 20 and Scheduled Tribes population is 14. Census Location Code of the town is 626932<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

Population wise class of the town is Class V (population_total 5,000 to 9,999).
The civic status of the town is 'Census Town'.

The nearest city with population more than 1 lakh is BELGAUM at a distance of 205 km. The nearest city with population more than 5 lakh is PUNE at a distance of 518 km. Railway station is at MARGAO at a distance of 7 km.

== Sanitation and Drinking Water ==  
The town has open and closed drainage system.
Water is supplied from a service reservoir. The town gets it water as tap water from a treated source. The capacity of the water supply system is 1400 kilo-litres.

The nearest fire fighting service is at MARGAO (7 km) .
